reviews.review: Крутая игра! Много оружия, скинов, доната и доната. Без доната можно, но скины бессплатные не имеются. Ставлю 3.5.
Sıkıcı kendini hiç oynattırmıyor saçma bir oyun.

oyunu yaklaşık 6 yıldır oynuyorum ve tek diyeceğim şey türkiye sunucusunu açın artık . Ruslardan bıktık artık hepsinin kafası güzelmidir nedir hepsi trollüyor ingilizce desen çoğu bilmiyor . Valve Duy beni .
500 часов, игра норм, правда не понял ничего
just play, don't get hype about it
в каждой катке читеры даже на прайме

i liked everything except for some toxic players who will threaten to kick you in game or just swear at you.If you dont want that to happen , you can just practice using workshop maps and you are ready.
Senelerdir cs oyuncusuyum ama artık şu oyuna bi el atın hileye çözüm getirin onca insanin emekleri boşa gitmesin.
Не покупайте эту помойку и не играйте в неё сервера ищет по пол года в каждой катке читеры игра хуйня полная надеюсь разработчики пидарасы надеюсь вы сдохните мрази
Принцепе игра хорошая но большая проблема ето читеры и античит.

Extremely Fun and Competitive. Good fun and a laugh to play with friends. Definitely recommend to others, especially if you haven't got it. Although, you should consider buying Prime as otherwise you will rage due to hackers (just like me!) ;0
Çok kaliteli. Hilelerde olmasa tadından yenmez.

It used to be a fun game, but since valve made the game free, it just became unplayable for me, so that's why im quitting this piece of crap game. I can't believe I actually paid money for this, because it's totally not worth it with Valve just not fixing the anti-cheat, and just releasing these shit updates that totally added nothing to the fucking gameplay. The only thing Valve want, is money. They don't care about how happy their customers are with their product, and this game is the perfect example.
